name: mitotic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the act or process of mitosis (= a type of cell division): The images were taken during progression of the first mitotic division. High mitotic activity of the tumour seemed to favour a poor prognosis. See
mitosis
More examplesFewer examplesDNA replication begins before the onset of the first mitotic division.Bacteria have been shown to disrupt the first mitotic divisions in fertilized eggs. Such mutants were considered to be of mitotic origin.
